original_text:
The Lord of hosts will protect them,
    and they shall devour, and tread down the sling stones,
and they shall drink and roar as if drunk with wine,
    and be full like a bowl,
    drenched like the corners of the altar.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 그들을 호위하시리니 그들이 원수를 삼키며 물맷돌을 밟을 것이며 그들이 피를 마시고 즐거이 부르기를 술취한 것 같이 할 것인즉 피가 가득한 동이와도 같고 피 묻은 제단 모퉁이와도 같을 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord of hosts will protect them
and tread down the sling stones
and roar as if drunk with wine
and be full like a bowl
drenched like the corners of the altar
